response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving of $300,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while offering you an excellent deal. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 1200000}
